headline: ProBlock® Launches as a Dedicated Primer Brand to bring Professional-Level Quality to Every Painting Project
summary: ProBlock is now launching at Sherwin-Williams and Lowe's with new primer products as a dedicated brand offering reliable performance for interior and exterior painting projects of any scale. ProBlock Quick Dry primers are available in water-based and oil-based formulas built for performance, delivering strong adhesion and stain blocking that pros count on to prepare surfaces and help topcoats perform at their best.
